action.existing:
Update your current instance to work with the new Malware incident type: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the Incident type field to Malware. 
3. Set the Mapper field to 'Microsoft Defender For Endpoint Mapper'.
action.new:
Set up new 'Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection' instance to start fetching malware incidents: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the Incident type field to Malware. 
3. Set the Mapper field to 'Microsoft Defender For Endpoint Mapper'.
